ItinerarySegment.Title: Arrive in London, England
ItinerarySegment.Text: After checking into your hotel, there is time to relax or begin exploring on your own.

ItinerarySegment.Title: London / Stratford-Upon-Avon / York / Harrogate
ItinerarySegment.Text: In Stratford-upon-Avon, visit Shakespeare’s birthplace and see Anne Hathaway’s cottage. On to York for a walk to see York Minster. Later, enjoy a Welcome Pub Reception with a British pub meal and drinks.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Harrogate / Lake District / Glasgow, Scotland
ItinerarySegment.Text: Drive to the scenic Lake District. Later, cross into Scotland at Gretna Green and head to Glasgow. See the city highlights on a short tour.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Edinburgh Excursion
ItinerarySegment.Text: Travel to Edinburgh where a tour with a Local Guide includes views of Princes Street and Holyrood House. After a guided visit to Edinburgh’s castle, head back to Glasgow, stopping at the Falkirk Wheel Visitor Centre on the way. Tonight enjoy dinner with wine in a local restaurant.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Glasgow / Belfast, Northern Ireland / Dublin, Ireland
ItinerarySegment.Text: Head to the coast and board a ferry to Belfast. Here, a tour with a Local Guide shows you the City Hall, Queen’s University and the dock where the Titanic was built. Then travel south to Dublin.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Dublin Sightseeing & Free Time
ItinerarySegment.Text: See Trinity College, St. Patrick’s Cathedral and the Georgian Squares. Then on to the Guinness Brewery for a tour and Unique Insight pintpulling demonstration. The rest of the day is free.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Dublin / Waterford
ItinerarySegment.Text: Stop at the Irish National Stud Farm with its world-class stallions. Take a walking tour through the Japanese Garden, then travel to Kilkenny and see its castle. At the Waterford Crystal Showrooms, learn about the creation of the fine crystal glass with time to shop.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Waterford / Cardiff, Wales
ItinerarySegment.Text: Head to Rosslare Harbour and take the ferry to South Wales. Drive to Cardiff, view its historic castle and see the Millennium Stadium. Later, relish a Be My Guest Farewell Dinner.
ItinerarySegment.Accommodation: Park Inn Hotel Cardiff City Centre

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cardiff / Bath, England / Stonehenge / London
ItinerarySegment.Text: Cross the Severn Bridge into England, heading to Bath. Visit the baths dating from Roman times. On for a visit to Stonehenge. Returning to London, your evening is free.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Depart London
ItinerarySegment.Text: You will be transferred to the airport (conditions apply), where your vacation ends.
